title: constant disconections and AFKs
body: what is up with all the disconnecting I have dced twice today and before this patch my client my enternet was fine I have just got leaver buster for this and I have noticed there are a lot of AFKs I just had 2 AFKs on my team wait for my leaver buster just to be placed with 2 AFKs is anyone else disconnecting??? and why???
